content: दीर्घ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>Compar.</ab> द्राघीयस्, <ab>Superl.</ab> द्राघिष्ठ) {@--1@} Long (in time or space), reaching far; दीर्घाक्षं शरदिंदुकांति वदनं <ls>M. 2. 3</ls>; दीर्घान् कटाक्षान् <ls>Me. 35</ls>; दीर्घापांग &c. {@--2@} Of long duration, lasting long, tedious; दीर्घयामा त्रियामा <ls>Me. 108</ls>; <ls>V. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Deep (as a sigh); <ls>Amaru. 11</ls>; दीर्घमुष्णं च निश्वस्य. {@--4@} Long (as a vowel), as the आ in काम. {@--5@} Lofty, high, tall. {@--6@} Dilated, expanded; <ls>U. 3. 46.</ls> --र्घः {@--1@} A camel. {@--2@} A long vowel. {@--3@} The fifth, sixth, seventh, and eighth signs of the zodiac. {@--4@} A kind of grass or reed. --र्घा A long lake or oblong tank. --र्घं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Long, for a long time. {@--2@} Deeply. {@--3@} Far.
